short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never lose track of important information from YouTube videos again! Our extension lets you create quick visual references with PDFs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of scribbling notes or losing track of important information you find on YouTube?  Vid2PDF is the solution you've been waiting for. This simple yet powerful Chrome extension lets you effortlessly capture key moments from any YouTube video and save them as convenient PDFs for later reference.

Why Install Vid2PDF?

Save Key Moments: Whether it's a lecture quote, a how-to step, or a funny meme, Vid2PDF lets you instantly capture screenshots of the exact frame you want.
Create Study Guides: Easily create visual study guides from educational videos, consolidating information for easier review.
Share Visual References: Share quotes, images, or diagrams with colleagues, classmates, or friends by converting screenshots to PDFs.
Simplify Research: Quickly gather visual data, charts, or research findings from videos and organize them in PDF format.
Save Time: No more pausing and rewinding to catch important details. Vid2PDF makes it quick and easy to capture what you need.

It's as Easy as 1-2-3:

Install: Add Vid2PDF to your Chrome browser in one click.
Capture: Click the "Capture" button in the extension, or press Command+C (Mac) or Control+C (Windows/Linux) while watching a YouTube video. A notification will confirm your screenshot.
Convert: Click the Vid2PDF extension icon to access your screenshots and convert them to PDFs in seconds.

Who Should Use Vid2PDF:

Students
Researchers
Content Creators
Educators
Anyone who uses YouTube to learn, teach, or share information!

Upgrade your YouTube experience with Vid2PDF and never lose track of important video content again.
